overview: Six years ago a band of misfit snowmobilers started following Cam "Hollywood" Hicks through the B.C. backcountry. They soon became the Hickshow crew and the FollowCam Series was born. What started as some local friends riding and pushing each other has expanded across the continent to include riders like the amazing Denver Debes from the East, our friends the Walker brothers and Zac Parks from the South, and the Greziuk brothers from the very middle of nowhere! Gear up and roll out into the world of extreme backcountry snowmobiling with FollowCam 6.
tagline: 6 years ago a band of misfit snowmobilers started following Cam "Hollywood" Hicks through the backcountry. They soon became the Hickshow crew and the FollowCam series was born. Gear up and roll out into the world of extreme backcountry snowmobiling.
title: FollowCam 6
